title: Allow user to pick community color
body:
It should be possible to pick up a color when creating a community

![image.png](https://images.zenhubusercontent.com/5eb28af232777f28c9e414e2/ad7f3217-1f35-4ec4-8a5e-40540c66f68b)

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 600.0 DAI (600.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/12129/100026068). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/12129/100026068). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin's Discord * $1,942,840.40 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)
What does this issue related to, is its the design(Figma) of the color picker or backend?

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__Workers have applied to start work__. These users each claimed they can complete the work by 264 years, 5 months from now. Please review their action plans below: **1) [aeidelas](https://gitcoin.co/aeidelas) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=aeidelas) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=aeidelas))_.** I will get the color combination from the web suitable for the action and apply it **2) [dimasfrr](https://gitcoin.co/dimasfrr) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=dimasfrr) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=dimasfrr))_.** Choose colour Red and White, like my Country. Make it Happend😀 **3) [beakersoft](https://gitcoin.co/beakersoft) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=beakersoft) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=beakersoft))_.** As well as the picker and presumably actually setting the colour, so we need a reset to default button or similar? Plan would be to create the picker, save the user input, then reflect the colour across the app. Needs testing across various platforms **4) [huymq](https://gitcoin.co/huymq) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=huymq) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=huymq))_.** I will get the color combination from the web suitable for the action and apply it **5) [bonsay7](https://gitcoin.co/bonsay7) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=bonsay7) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=bonsay7))_.** Combo wombo with gambling crypto **6) [kenzijie](https://gitcoin.co/kenzijie) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=kenzijie) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=kenzijie))_.** You can use the default white color and mix it with seafoam, That would look interesting if you asked me. **7) [icedstar71](https://gitcoin.co/icedstar71) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=icedstar71) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=icedstar71))_.** Executando uma base disponível de cores para formar uma configuração do usuário inicial, podendo ser alterado para outras cores futuramente. Possibilidade de ter cores customizadas pelo próprio usuário. **8) [winnilee](https://gitcoin.co/winnilee) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=winnilee) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=winnilee))_.** I prefer Green. But I think can let user set their color. **9) [mralex145](https://gitcoin.co/mralex145) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=mralex145) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=mralex145))_.** light/dark blue I think is good. mixed with crypto logo or with a unique logo 😁 **10) [kewe63](https://gitcoin.co/kewe63) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=kewe63) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=kewe63))_.** I am thinking of a combination that will appeal to people's eyes and will not tire them. **11) [nizam8089](https://gitcoin.co/nizam8089) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=nizam8089) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=nizam8089))_.** it's pretty much easy to do but i will try to give my best on this project. **12) [radoie99](https://gitcoin.co/radoie99) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=radoie99) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=radoie99))_.** 0x4350f60f702E678D16F3727Ef73D7D2175977a69 **13) [ayomifay](https://gitcoin.co/ayomifay) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=ayomifay) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=ayomifay))_.** I'm a graphic designer, I would like to handle the project graphic design aspect.. **14) [alanling888](https://gitcoin.co/alanling888) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=alanling888) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=alanling888))_.** Hope it can working to successfully **15) [jnm2388](https://gitcoin.co/jnm2388) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=jnm2388) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=jnm2388))_.** I believe I could choose the best color scheme for you . Wouldn't take me to long to go through and try out multiple schemes. **16) [sleek4](https://gitcoin.co/sleek4) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=sleek4) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=sleek4))_.** I would love to do all the task involved at the long run **17) [dman133](https://gitcoin.co/dman133) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=dman133) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=dman133))_.** Вы можете использовать белый цвет по умолчанию и смешать его с морской пеной. Это выглядело бы интересно, если бы вы спросили меня. **18) [damolaba](https://gitcoin.co/damolaba) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=damolaba) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=damolaba))_.** It will be nice to explore my creativity and have fun while doing this project. **19) [tyntyn1](https://gitcoin.co/tyntyn1) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=tyntyn1) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=tyntyn1))_.** Stk 1017568911 Tên NGUYEN HOANG PHUONG TRU SO CHINH NAM SAI GON NGÂN HÀNG VIETCOMBANK **20) [hustler05](https://gitcoin.co/hustler05) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=hustler05) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=hustler05))_.** How hard could it be possibly be? **21) [yide000](https://gitcoin.co/yide000) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=yide000) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=yide000))_.** My plan would be to offer some default colors and then at the bottom a colour picker for a custom color. **22) [arbreton](https://gitcoin.co/arbreton) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=arbreton) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=arbreton))_.** This is straight forward, should take no time **23) [nick123-debug](https://gitcoin.co/nick123-debug) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=nick123-debug) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=nick123-debug))_.** Research shows that color can significantly influence consumer mood. This will occur right throughout the life cycle of the product - In this case a crypto Kittie. See future of Kitties here if correct colour is not chosen. ------------------------------------------------ https://opensea.io/assets/0xd07dc4262bcdbf85190c01c996b4c06a461d2430/35051 ------------------------------- Harnessing the interesting psychological effects of colour can be used to create feelings in potential consumers, such as trust or engagement, which can help to encourage interest in your product from your target consumer market. Audience Recognition - Product and Brand already exists Mood - Purple , Red , Pink and 'Throw-up' colours work well & creates diversity Perception - 'Will your kittie represent you? If so this is a personal thing and thoughts should be kept for yourself. Future Value - Would the throw-up colour effect the resale value ? Is the kitty tall enough ? These are normal ' In your head questions to mull over. Branding - If it works, How doth one do it again? But Better. If I am chosen to help out I will promote the Kitty ---- https://linktr.ee/BitcoinAssets **24) [space38](https://gitcoin.co/space38) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=space38) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=space38))_.** Я изучу какие цвета более привлекательны и какие цвета людям больше нравятся людям , какие подходят больше всего к community **25) [dishantjari](https://gitcoin.co/dishantjari) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=dishantjari) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=dishantjari))_.** Sir I think you should use Mild Sky colour because it won’t damage eyes and that colour is calm so that user wont be frustrated just by watching it **26) [lavellthedev](https://gitcoin.co/lavellthedev) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=lavellthedev) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=lavellthedev))_.** I am interested in working on this. I believe a few more details would make this easier to do. But I have the capability of completing this. **27) [zachminot](https://gitcoin.co/zachminot) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=zachminot) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=zachminot))_.** I can do this! Let's talk! I will make sure to write clean, secure code. **28) [tolgakmbl](https://gitcoin.co/tolgakmbl) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=tolgakmbl) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=tolgakmbl))_.** Let's do it in react, as an example: - Assume there is a color array called 'colors'. You can assing a color to the div's. '
' -And the color comes from a form input value '
{ event.preventDefault() const color = this.color.value this.add(color) // pushes to the array }}> { this.color = input }} /> ' **29) [hunter696969](https://gitcoin.co/hunter696969) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=hunter696969) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=hunter696969))_.** I am from Mexico and I am really interestend in crypto world and the bounties **30) [stryvin](https://gitcoin.co/stryvin) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=stryvin) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=stryvin))_.** Hi everyone, This project same very interesting to challenge my coding skills. I would love to participate in this project and contribute as well. **31) [federicochediack](https://gitcoin.co/federicochediack) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=federicochediack) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=federicochediack))_.** My plan is: - First i'm going to benchmark this type of input in other apps (mostly design apps). - Then i'm going to code the color-picker component. - Then i'll make integration test with the whole screen Learn more [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/26068).
